about_the_game:
IMPORTANT NOTE:

The game emphasizes atmospheric exploration and slow-building tension to deliver a deep and immersive horror experience. Its story unfolds through symbolic imagery, cryptic environments, and subtle narrative cues. Be prepared for a challenge that goes beyond conventional gameplay mechanics.

Overview

Step into a first-person psychological horror where the elevator becomes your prison—and your escape. Each stop unveils a unique world, filled with eerie beauty and unrelenting terror. From abandoned hospitals to surreal forests, you’ll navigate through unsettling environments, collecting keycards and piecing together a dark, enigmatic story.

Environment

Every floor is a world of its own, crafted with painstaking detail and haunting atmosphere. Traverse warped corridors of psychiatric facilities, explore lifeless forests under an artificial sky, or unravel the secrets of an abandoned complex. Each location feels alive, yet void of life, leaving you with only your fears to keep you company.

Storyline

Why are you here? Who—or what—is pulling the strings? Each floor presents fragments of a narrative too horrifying to confront at once. From tales of suffering and madness to cryptic messages hidden in the shadows, you must uncover the truth. But the answers may be as dangerous as the mysteries themselves.

Entities

The worlds are not empty. Unseen forces watch your every move. They distort your reality, manipulate your perceptions, and prey on your vulnerabilities. Are they merely echoes of past tragedies, or are they something far worse? Survival means confronting these entities while keeping your sanity intact.

Gameplay

You are vulnerable—no weapons, no means of defense, only your wits and resolve. Search for clues, solve puzzles, and tread carefully. Staying in the light may offer temporary safety, but the deeper you go, the harder it becomes to trust even that. Your sanity is your lifeline, but it’s as fragile as the environments you explore.

MATURE CONTENT DESCRIPTION

This game contains graphic depictions of violence, psychological torment, and themes of trauma. Some scenes include references to substance abuse and self-harm. The content is not suitable for all audiences. Player discretion is advised.

Prepare yourself for a journey into the unknown. Not every truth is meant to be uncovered—and not every soul finds its way out.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: (Intel): Core i5-2300 @ 2,80 GHz, (AMD): FX 8120 @ 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: (NVIDIA): GeForce® GT 730, (AMD): Radeon R7 240
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: (AMD): Ryzen 7 2700, (Intel): Core i7-8700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: (NVIDIA): GeForce® GTX 1060, (AMD): Radeon RX Vega 64
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Every floor is a new world. A first-person psychological horror where every floor is a new nightmare. Travel through chilling environments, unravel disturbing stories as the elevator takes you deeper and deeper into the unknown. Can you make it to the last floor?
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
